title: It's about the dots that connect themselves
html:
Further self-directed dot connection via Sam Ruby:

I talked Sanjiva Weerawarana into creating a Radio weblog. He's one of the driving forces behind many important Web services standards including WSDL and BPEL4WS.

Welcome to the Blogosphere, Sanjiva! :)

shortname=ooobci
